hotDrinks.name: Hot Chocolate
hotDrinks.description: A heated drink consisting of shaved chocolate, heated milk and sweetener garnished with whipped cream and marshmallows.

hotDrinks.name: Hot Matcha
hotDrinks.description: Sifted matcha powder and hot water before combined with frothed, heated milk.

hotDrinks.name: Lavender Chamomile Tea
hotDrinks.description: A tea blend of chamomile and lavender mixed with warm, frothed milk.

hotDrinks.name: Pumpkin Maple
hotDrinks.description: Brewed coffee combined with coconut milk, vanilla, spiced pumpkin butter, and cinnamon.

hotDrinks.name: Spiced Cider
hotDrinks.description: A warm, flavorful drink made by simmering apple cider with various whole spices and citrus fruits.

hotDrinks.name: Vanilla Chai
hotDrinks.description: A creamy, sweetened, spiced tea with prominent flavors of warm spices.

ColdDrinks.name: Iced Caramel Latte
ColdDrinks.description: Smooth espresso blended with chilled milk and caramel sauce, served over ice. Perfect for a refreshing coffee break.
ColdDrinks.alt: Iced Latte in a glass with ice

ColdDrinks.name: Iced Mocha
ColdDrinks.description: Rich espresso, chocolate syrup, and cold milk, topped with a chocolate drizzle. A sweet, cool treat.

ColdDrinks.name: Fresh Lemonade
ColdDrinks.description: Zesty and refreshing lemonade made with freshly squeezed lemons and a hint of mint.

ColdDrinks.name: Strawberry Acai Refresher
ColdDrinks.description: A vibrant blend of strawberry and acai flavors, served over ice for a refreshing, fruity drink.

ColdDrinks.name: Mango Smoothie
ColdDrinks.description: A creamy blend of ripe mangoes, yogurt, and ice, offering a tropical and refreshing taste.

ColdDrinks.name: Iced Matcha Latte
ColdDrinks.description: Vibrant green matcha powder whisked with cold milk and served over ice for a smooth, earthy refreshment.

Desserts.name: Tiramisu
Desserts.description: A rich, coffee-flavored Italian dessert with layers of mascarpone cream and cocoa.
Desserts.ingredients: mascarpone cheese, coffee, ladyfingers, cocoa, sugar

Desserts.name: Dubai Strawberry Cup
Desserts.description: A refreshing dessert cup with fresh strawberries and creamy layers.

Desserts.name: Pastry
Desserts.description: Flaky, buttery pastry with a sweet filling, perfect for a treat.

Desserts.name: Chocolate Cake
Desserts.description: Moist chocolate cake with a rich ganache topping.

Desserts.name: Creme Brulee
Desserts.description: Silky vanilla custard topped with a caramelized sugar crust.

Desserts.name: Ice Cream Sundae
Desserts.description: A delightful mix of ice cream, toppings, and whipped cream.
Desserts.ingredients: ice cream, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, nuts
